meanings.definition: Not having undergone the Christian rite of baptism.
meanings.sent1: The unbaptized baby had not yet been welcomed into the church.
meanings.sent2: The unbaptized children were not allowed to participate in the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The unbaptized puppy tried to join the choir but couldn't sing.
meanings.sent4: The garden, unbaptized by rain, longed for the touch of water.
meanings.sent5: The unbaptized field remained dry and barren under the scorching sun.

meanings.definition: Not initiated into a particular activity or group.
meanings.sent1: The unbaptized students were not familiar with the club's rules.
meanings.sent2: She felt like an unbaptized member in the exclusive society.
meanings.sent3: The unbaptized chef attempted to cook the secret recipe with disastrous results.
meanings.sent4: His unbaptized mind struggled to grasp the complexities of the game.
meanings.sent5: The unbaptized traveler wandered lost in the unfamiliar city streets.
